question: [Calm] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.

qas.question: [Calm] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.
[Focus] Italiano: Individua the intercept of the noisy line della retta disegnata.
[Brief] Nederlands: Bepaal the value of y when x equals 1 van de getekende lijn.
